features: 👍【𝟏𝟔𝐆𝐁(𝟖+𝟖) 𝐑𝐀𝐌 + 𝟏𝟐𝟖𝐆𝐁 𝐑𝐎𝐌 + 𝟏𝐓𝐁 𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐚𝐧𝐝】Tablet comes with 8GB RAM the tablets already has,which can add another 8GB of virtual memory in the settings to achieve a total of 16GB of running memory. Up to 128GB of ROM and 1TB of external storage give ample room for streaming or downloading your favorite shows and movies from Prime Video, Netflix, Disney+, and HBO. Enjoy your favorite content from Facebook, Hulu, Instagram, TikTok, and more through Google Play Store.

👍【𝟭𝟵𝟮𝟬𝗫𝟭𝟮𝟬𝟬 𝗗𝗶𝘀𝗽𝗹𝗮𝘆 +𝟭𝟬.𝟭 𝗶𝗻𝗰𝗵 + 𝟭𝟯𝗠𝗣 𝗖𝗮𝗺𝗲𝗿𝗮】A large 10.1 inch 1920 x 1200 resolution display with 13MP Camera mean faster, clearer, and smoother connections on calls, whether for work, with family and friends on Zoom, or on social media apps.brings your content to life in brilliant color whether indoors or outdoors, making this android tablet a great tablet for study time or for a quick entertainment break.
👍【𝟳𝟬𝟬𝟬𝗺𝗔𝗵 𝗕𝗮𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘆 +𝗟𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁𝘄𝗲𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁 𝗠𝗲𝘁𝗮𝗹 𝗕𝗼𝗱𝘆】 With 7000 mAh 14-hour battery life, maximize your downtime for reading, browsing the web, watching videos, and listening to music at home and on-the-go

Perfect for Christmas, Birthday, Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Father's Day, Wedding, Thanksgiving Day, or Graduation. heart-warming surprise for your friends, kids, parents or anyone who would like to share happiness. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice tablet. Easy to use. Love the touch screen function. Great price. Charging cord is too short for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Almost too good to be true
reviews.reviewText: This is an amazing value for the money. It works right out of the box, it easily connects to the internet and loads and works with all apps that I need.On top it comes with accessories, that alone are worth the money. I got the protection case, keyboard, mouse, a USB to USB-C adapter, the sim tray pin, a screen protection film, a stylus pen and a mouse.I tried the keyboard, it connects right away and works fine.The display is extremely bright, it has a bit too much blue while the night mode contains way too much red. Unfortunately I could not find any settings to change the picture settings.It is well build and sturdy, however it is a bit heavy in the hand and it has rather hard corners and edges.I could not ask for more, give the price of only $169.The processor is fast and snappy, the integrated RAM enough to handle the tasks I need it for in a good timely manner. 4 out of 5!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far I'm impressed
reviews.reviewText: Fast delivery, easy setup, runs great! Works a little different than my previous Galaxy tablet, but so far I've been able to quickly figure it out. Great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I hoped it would be
reviews.reviewText: For some time now I have relied on a laptop and a small reader (a Fire7). Both did what I wanted of them: the laptop for doing all my on-line activities and some word processing, and the Fire for reading. But both also had shortcomings: altho the laptop is reasonably lightweight, it is still a hassle for traveling; the Fire I find too small for on-line activities (movies, browsing, even email) and, truth be told, a number of apps I use regularly (e.g., local news and sports) are just not available (or reliable) on the Fire platform. So, this splits the difference perfectly: all the apps I use with my laptop (including some word processing and a better-than-expected keyboard), a large enough and very vivid screen, but also small enough that it easily works a my reader.So far, this seems solid, well-made, holds a long charge, and all the accessories (keyboard, mouse, cover) are first-rate. When you consider the price differential with the Fire (especially if you want to no-ads version) or a laptop, this was spot-on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tablet at a Great Price
reviews.reviewText: What is not to like? A usable tablet, keyboard, mouse, case and even a pen. Oh yes, a cover also. Setup was easy. Up and using for what ever your quest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid design. Great price.
reviews.reviewText: Day 1: Impressed with everything so far. Great price, solid quality. Haven't had a chance to use all the features before registering. But I have high hopes.Day 2: Still going strong. The mouse they give you comes only with a USB A dongle. But the tablet only has a USB C port. I ended up having to buy a Bluetooth mouse, separately. Still impressed with the tablet.Day 3: Not much use. But still happy with the purchase.Day 4: Had to take my son to the urgent care. It connected to their wifi with no problems. It kept him occupied, but it definitely isn't kid proof. My anxienty was slightly elevated at the thought of him dropping it. Based off the feel of the case, I don't imagine it surviving a fall onto tile floor. But still pleased, since I bought it for a work tablet.Day 5: Took it with me to work today. Handled well. Used it to review PDF documents. Responded quickly. Continued connecting to various wifi routers with no problems. Ordered a 256gb micro sd card to expand storage.Day 6: Micro SD card arrived. Plugged it in. When I formatted it, it asked me whether I should use it for removable storage or expanding internal storage. Told it to use as internal. Now I have 320gb of space. Still working well.Day 7: Full week has gone by. Started using it for school work. No issues connecting to classes. Was able to submit assignment and read texts.After a week of use, I'm still pleased with it. Very little delay or stuttering when switching programs. The battery life is solid. I can make it through a full day with only using about 70% of the battery. For the price, it makes a great companion. The only downside I've seen so far is the mouse they included not having the right connection. Other than that, I'm extremely pleased. It works nearly as well as a name brand tablet. Will definitely buy again, if needed..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bang for your buck!!
reviews.reviewText: I just received this today. I was looking for something economical yet versatile to read my textbooks and other ebooks on. I have to say, that so far I am blown away by it. It has surpassed my expectations. It was so simple to set up, all the needed accessories were included, and the overall performance is amazing. Sound quality is great. Video playback without freezing or glitches. All in all, I don't think I could have made a better investment.

reviews.reviewerName: Bought the book and it delivered today. I started using it already tonight. It's a great supplemental item to go along with the textbook. Whether you are reviewing for a test or simply need more reinforcement. Wish I came across it earlier!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little tablet! Surpassed my expectations
reviews.reviewText: Bought it to use in class and navigate my elsevier/evolve account. Good for ebook reading and surfing. My laptop is bulky and not a good travel companion. It is pretty quick and does the job for me. Comes in a sturdy box. Drawback is that I have to use the charger that comes with it. Although other chargers fit, they donot charge up the item for some reason.
